channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-13294|2024-08-05T09:00:34.526Z -- synology -- application%20service
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in SYNO.Personal.Profile in Synology Application Service before 1.5.4-0320 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive system information via the uid parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-8925|2024-08-05T07:10:46.825Z -- synology -- photo%20station
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in admin/user.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.8.5-3471 and before 6.3-2975 allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via the (1) username, (2) password, (3) admin, (4) action, (5) uid, or (6) modify_admin parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-8921|2024-08-05T07:10:46.654Z -- synology -- drive
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in File Sharing Notify Toast in Synology Drive before 1.0.2-10275 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the malicious file name.

item.title: CVE-2017-11162|2024-08-05T17:57:57.917Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in synphotoio in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.4-3433 and 6.3-2968 allows remote authenticated users to read arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-8918|2024-08-05T07:10:46.972Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in info.cgi in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.1.7-6941 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the host parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-11153|2024-08-05T17:57:58.039Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: Deserialization vulnerability in synophoto_csPhotoMisc.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.3-3432 and 6.3-2967 allows remote attackers to gain administrator privileges via a crafted serialized payload.

item.title: CVE-2017-12074|2024-08-05T18:28:15.632Z -- synology -- synology%20dns%20server
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the SYNO.DNSServer.Zone.MasterZoneConf in Synology DNS Server before 2.2.1-3042 allows remote authenticated attackers to write arbitrary files via the domain_name parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-8911|2024-08-05T07:10:46.602Z -- synology -- note%20station
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Attachment Preview in Synology Note Station before 2.5.1-0844 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via malicious attachments.

item.title: CVE-2017-11152|2024-08-05T17:57:57.976Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in PixlrEditorHandler.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.3-3432 and 6.3-2967 allows remote attackers to write arbitrary files via the path parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-13299|2024-08-05T09:00:34.574Z -- synology -- calendar
item.description: Relative path traversal vulnerability in Attachment Uploader in Synology Calendar before 2.2.2-0532 allows remote authenticated users to upload arbitrary files via the filename parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-12071|2024-08-05T18:28:15.785Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: Server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in file_upload.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.4-3433 and 6.3-2968 allows remote authenticated users to download arbitrary local files via the url parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-13289|2024-08-05T09:00:34.485Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in SYNO.FolderSharing.List in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.1.7-6941-2 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via the (1) folder_path or (2) real_path parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-9552|2024-08-05T17:11:02.282Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: A design flaw in authentication in Synology Photo Station 6.0-2528 through 6.7.1-3419 allows local users to obtain credentials via cmdline. Synology Photo Station employs the synophoto_dsm_user program to authenticate username and password by "synophoto_dsm_user --auth USERNAME PASSWORD", and local users are able to obtain credentials by sniffing "/proc/*/cmdline".

item.title: CVE-2018-8922|2024-08-05T07:10:46.618Z -- synology -- drive
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Synology Drive before 1.0.2-10275 allows remote authenticated users to access non-shared files or folders via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-8915|2024-08-05T07:10:46.619Z -- synology -- calendar
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Notification Center in Synology Calendar before 2.1.1-0502 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via title parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-8929|2024-08-05T07:10:46.759Z -- synology -- ssl%20vpn%20client
item.description: Improper restriction of communication channel to intended endpoints vulnerability in HTTP daemon in Synology SSL VPN Client before 1.2.4-0224 allows remote attackers to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks via a crafted payload.

item.title: CVE-2018-13283|2024-08-05T09:00:33.480Z -- synology -- ssl%20vpn%20client
item.description: Lack of administrator control over security vulnerability in client.cgi in Synology SSL VPN Client before 1.2.5-0226 allows remote attackers to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks via the (1) command, (2) hostname, or (3) port parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-12078|2024-08-05T18:28:16.475Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Command injection vulnerability in EZ-Internet in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.1.6-6931 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary command via the username parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-13295|2024-08-05T09:00:35.060Z -- synology -- application%20service
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in SYNO.Personal.Application.Info in Synology Application Service before 1.5.4-0320 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive system information via the version parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-12075|2024-08-05T18:28:15.678Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Command injection vulnerability in EZ-Internet in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2-23739 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary command via the username parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-11161|2024-08-05T17:57:57.989Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.4-3433 and 6.3-2968 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) article_id parameter to label.php; or (2) type parameter to synotheme.php.

item.title: CVE-2018-8923|2024-08-05T07:10:46.598Z -- synology -- file%20station
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Attachment Preview in Synology File Station before 1.1.4-0122 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via malicious attachments.

item.title: CVE-2018-13293|2024-08-05T09:00:34.603Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Control Panel SSO Settings in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.1-23824 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the URL parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-8920|2024-08-05T07:10:47.020Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Improper neutralization of escape vulnerability in Log Exporter in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.1.6-15266 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary content to have an unspecified impact by exporting an archive in CSV format.

item.title: CVE-2018-8917|2024-08-05T07:10:46.995Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in info.cgi in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.1.6-15266 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the host parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-11156|2024-08-05T17:57:57.999Z -- synology -- synology%20download%20station
item.description: Synology Download Station 3.8.x before 3.8.5-3475 and 3.x before 3.5-2984 uses weak permissions (0777) for ui/dlm/btsearch directory, which allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code by uploading an executable via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-8924|2024-08-05T07:10:46.642Z -- synology -- office
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Title Tootip in Synology Office before 3.0.3-2143 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the malicious file name.

item.title: CVE-2017-12079|2024-08-05T18:28:15.751Z -- synology -- photo%20station
item.description: Files or directories accessible to external parties vulnerability in picasa.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.8.1-3458 and before 6.3-2970 allows remote attackers to obtain arbitrary files via prog_id field.

item.title: CVE-2017-12080|2024-08-05T18:28:16.264Z -- synology -- photo%20station
item.description: An information exposure vulnerability in default HTTP configuration file in Synology Photo Station before 6.8.1-3458 and before 6.3-2970 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive system information via .htaccess file.

item.title: CVE-2017-9556|2024-08-05T17:11:02.199Z -- synology -- synology%20video%20station
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Video Metadata Editor in Synology Video Station before 2.3.0-1435 allows remote authenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the title parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-11159|2024-08-05T17:57:58.064Z -- synology -- photo%20station%20uploader
item.description: Multiple untrusted search path vulnerabilities in installer in Synology Photo Station Uploader before 1.4.2-084 on Windows allows local attackers to execute arbitrary code and conduct DLL hijacking attack via a Trojan horse (1) shfolder.dll, (2) ntmarta.dll, (3) secur32.dll or (4) dwmapi.dll file in the current working directory.

item.title: CVE-2017-12072|2024-08-05T18:28:16.526Z -- synology -- photo%20station
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PixlrEditorHandler.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.8.0-3456 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web scripts or HTML via the id parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-8927|2024-08-05T07:10:46.616Z -- synology -- calendar
item.description: Improper authorization vulnerability in SYNO.Cal.Event in Calendar before 2.1.2-0511 allows remote authenticated users to create arbitrary events via the (1) cal_id or (2) original_cal_id parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-8910|2024-08-05T07:10:46.731Z -- synology -- drive
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Attachment Preview in Synology Drive before 1.0.1-10253 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via malicious attachments.

item.title: CVE-2018-13284|2024-08-05T09:00:34.594Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Command injection vulnerability in ftpd in Synology Diskstation Manager (DSM) before 6.2-23739-1 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary OS commands via the (1) MKD or (2) RMD command.

item.title: CVE-2017-11154|2024-08-05T17:57:57.677Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in PixlrEditorHandler.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.3-3432 and 6.3-2967 allows remote attackers to create arbitrary PHP scripts via the type parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-8914|2024-08-05T07:10:46.558Z -- synology -- media%20server
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in UPnP DMA in Synology Media Server before 1.7.6-2842 and before 1.4-2654 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the ObjectID parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-13292|2024-08-05T09:00:34.334Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in /usr/syno/etc/mount.conf in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.1.7-6941-2 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information via the world readable configuration.

item.title: CVE-2018-13286|2024-08-05T09:00:34.080Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Incorrect default permissions vulnerability in synouser.conf in Synology Diskstation Manager (DSM) before 6.2-23739-1 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information via the world readable configuration.

item.title: CVE-2017-9555|2024-08-05T17:11:02.273Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PixlrEditorHandler.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.0-3414 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the image parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-11151|2024-08-05T17:57:57.985Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: A vulnerability in synotheme_upload.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.3-3432 and 6.3-2967 allows remote attackers to upload arbitrary files without authentication via the logo_upload action.

item.title: CVE-2018-13297|2024-08-05T09:00:34.660Z -- synology -- drive
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in SYNO.SynologyDrive.Files in Synology Drive before 1.1.2-10562 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive system information via the dsm_path parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-8912|2024-08-05T07:10:46.802Z -- synology -- note%20station
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in SYNO.NoteStation.Note in Synology Note Station before 2.5.1-0844 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the commit_msg parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-8916|2024-08-05T07:10:46.953Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Unverified password change vulnerability in Change Password in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2-23739 allows remote authenticated users to reset password without verification.

item.title: CVE-2018-13298|2024-08-05T09:00:34.532Z -- synology -- android%20moments
item.description: Channel accessible by non-endpoint vulnerability in privacy page in Synology Android Moments before 1.2.3-199 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-13280|2024-08-05T09:00:34.653Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Use of insufficiently random values vulnerability in SYNO.Encryption.GenRandomKey in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2-23739 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to compromise non-HTTPS sessions via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-11155|2024-08-05T17:57:58.052Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: An information exposure vulnerability in index.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.3-3432 and 6.3-2967 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive system information via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-13290|2024-08-05T09:00:34.544Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in SYNO.Core.ACL in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.1.7-6941-2 allows remote authenticated users to determine the existence of files or obtain sensitive information of files via the file_path parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-11149|2024-08-05T17:57:58.800Z -- synology -- synology%20download%20station
item.description: Server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Downloader in Synology Download Station 3.8.x before 3.8.5-3475 and 3.x before 3.5-2984 allows remote authenticated users to download arbitrary local files via crafted URI.

item.title: CVE-2018-13296|2024-08-05T09:00:34.511Z -- synology -- mailplus%20server
item.description: Uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability in TLS configuration in Synology MailPlus Server before 2.0.5-0606 allows remote attackers to conduct denial-of-service attacks via client-initiated renegotiation.

item.title: CVE-2018-13287|2024-08-05T09:00:34.595Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Incorrect default permissions vulnerability in synouser.conf in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.1.7-6941-1 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information via the world readable configuration.

item.title: CVE-2018-13291|2024-08-05T09:00:34.890Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in /usr/syno/etc/mount.conf in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.1-23824 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information via the world readable configuration.

item.title: CVE-2017-11148|2024-08-05T17:57:58.044Z -- synology -- synology%20chat
item.description: Server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in link preview in Synology Chat before 1.1.0-0806 allows remote authenticated users to access intranet resources via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-13282|2024-08-05T09:00:34.016Z -- synology -- photo%20station
item.description: Session fixation vulnerability in SYNO.PhotoStation.Auth in Synology Photo Station before 6.8.7-3481 allows remote attackers to hijack web sessions via the PHPSESSID parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-13281|2024-08-05T09:00:34.108Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in SYNO.Core.ACL in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2-23739-2 allows remote authenticated users to determine the existence and obtain the metadata of arbitrary files via the file_path parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-8919|2024-08-05T07:10:46.855Z -- synology -- diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in SYNO.Core.Desktop.SessionData in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.1.6-15266 allows remote attackers to steal credentials via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-13285|2024-08-05T09:00:34.015Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Command injection vulnerability in ftpd in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.1.7-6941-1 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary OS commands via the (1) MKD or (2) RMD command.

item.title: CVE-2018-8928|2024-08-05T07:10:47.217Z -- synology -- carddav%20server
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Address Book Editor in Synology CardDAV Server before 6.0.8-0086 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) family_name, (2) given_name, or (3) additional_name parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-11158|2024-08-05T17:57:58.118Z -- synology -- cloud%20station%20drive
item.description: Multiple untrusted search path vulnerabilities in the installer in Synology Cloud Station Drive before 4.2.5-4396 on Windows allow local attackers to execute arbitrary code and conduct DLL hijacking attacks via a Trojan horse (1) shfolder.dll, (2) ntmarta.dll, (3) secur32.dll or (4) dwmapi.dll file in the current working directory.

item.title: CVE-2018-13288|2024-08-05T09:00:34.706Z -- synology -- file%20station
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in SYNO.FolderSharing.List in Synology File Station before 1.2.3-0252 and before 1.1.5-0125 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via the (1) folder_path or (2) real_path parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-8926|2024-08-05T07:10:46.941Z -- synology -- photo%20station
item.description: Permissive regular expression vulnerability in synophoto_dsm_user in Synology Photo Station before 6.8.5-3471 and before 6.3-2975 allows remote authenticated users to conduct privilege escalation attacks via the fullname parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-8913|2024-08-05T07:10:46.703Z -- synology -- web%20station
item.description: Missing custom error page vulnerability in Synology Web Station before 2.1.3-0139 allows remote attackers to conduct phishing attacks via a crafted URL.

item.title: CVE-2024-39348|2024-08-02T04:26:14.241Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Download of code without integrity check vulnerability in AirPrint functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39351|2024-08-02T04:26:14.288Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') is found in the NTP configuration. This allows remote authenticated users with administrator privileges to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.title: CVE-2024-39352|2024-08-02T04:26:14.272Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding incorrect authorization is found in the firmware upgrade functionality. This allows remote authenticated users with administrator privileges to bypass firmware integrity check via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.title: CVE-2024-39347|2024-08-02T04:26:14.241Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Incorrect default permissions vulnerability in firewall functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to access highly sensitive intranet resources via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39350|2024-08-02T04:26:14.798Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding authentication bypass by spoofing is found in the RTSP functionality. This allows man-in-the-middle attackers to obtain privileges without consent via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.title: CVE-2024-39349|2024-08-02T04:26:15.428Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding buffer copy without checking size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') is found in the libjansson component and it does not affect the upstream library. This allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.title: CVE-2024-29236|2024-07-17T14:46:49.421Z -- synology -- surveillance%20station
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an SQL command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in AudioPattern.Delete webapi component in Synology Surveillance Station before 9.2.0-9289 and 9.2.0-11289 allows remote authenticated users to inject SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-29239|2024-07-17T14:47:22.503Z -- synology -- surveillance%20station
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an SQL command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Recording.CountByCategory webapi component in Synology Surveillance Station before 9.2.0-11289 and 9.2.0-9289 allows remote authenticated users to inject SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-29228|2024-07-17T14:41:57.061Z -- synology -- surveillance%20station
item.description: Missing authorization vulnerability in GetStmUrlPath webapi component in Synology Surveillance Station before 9.2.0-9289 and 9.2.0-11289 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-29232|2024-07-17T14:38:45.172Z -- synology -- surveillance%20station
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an SQL command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Alert.Enum webapi component in Synology Surveillance Station before 9.2.0-11289 and 9.2.0-9289 allows remote authenticated users to inject SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-29230|2024-07-17T14:46:08.323Z -- synology -- surveillance%20station
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an SQL command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in SnapShot.CountByCategory webapi component in Synology Surveillance Station before 9.2.0-9289 and 9.2.0-11289 allows remote authenticated users to inject SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-29241|2024-07-17T14:42:37.136Z -- synology -- surveillance%20station
item.description: Missing authorization vulnerability in System webapi component in Synology Surveillance Station before 9.2.0-9289 and 9.2.0-11289 allows remote authenticated users to bypass security constraints via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39349|2024-07-03T18:22:28.863Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding buffer copy without checking size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') is found in the libjansson component and it does not affect the upstream library. This allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.title: CVE-2024-39347|2024-07-02T16:39:01.301Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Incorrect default permissions vulnerability in firewall functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to access highly sensitive intranet resources via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39348|2024-06-28T13:39:34.938Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Download of code without integrity check vulnerability in AirPrint functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39351|2024-06-28T06:07:21.260Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') is found in the NTP configuration. This allows remote authenticated users with administrator privileges to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.title: CVE-2024-39347|2024-06-28T06:30:10.727Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Incorrect default permissions vulnerability in firewall functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to access highly sensitive intranet resources via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39348|2024-06-28T06:30:57.973Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Download of code without integrity check vulnerability in AirPrint functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2023-47803|2024-06-28T06:03:01.476Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') is found in the Language Settings functionality. This allows remote attackers to read specific files containing non-sensitive information via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.title: CVE-2023-47802|2024-06-28T06:01:58.733Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') is found in the IP block functionality. This allows remote authenticated users with administrator privileges to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.title: CVE-2024-39350|2024-06-28T06:55:25.157Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding authentication bypass by spoofing is found in the RTSP functionality. This allows man-in-the-middle attackers to obtain privileges without consent via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.title: CVE-2024-39352|2024-06-28T06:07:52.739Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding incorrect authorization is found in the firmware upgrade functionality. This allows remote authenticated users with administrator privileges to bypass firmware integrity check via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.title: CVE-2024-39349|2024-06-28T06:03:59.624Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding buffer copy without checking size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') is found in the libjansson component and it does not affect the upstream library. This allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.0.7-0298 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.

item.title: CVE-2024-29227|2024-03-28T06:08:34.641Z -- synology -- surveillance%20station
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an SQL command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Layout.LayoutSave webapi component in Synology Surveillance Station before 9.2.0-9289 and 9.2.0-11289 allows remote authenticated users to inject SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-29231|2024-06-04T17:56:48.884Z -- synology -- surveillance%20station
item.description: Improper validation of array index vulnerability in UserPrivilege.Enum webapi component in Synology Surveillance Station before 9.2.0-9289 and 9.2.0-11289 allows remote authenticated users to bypass security constraints via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-5463|2024-06-04T18:02:05.229Z -- synology -- camera%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding buffer copy without checking the size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') has been found in the login component. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.1.1-0383 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.
